journey-1.0.4 Documentation

  • github.com/rails/journey

DESCRIPTION:

Journey is a router. It routes requests.

FEATURES/PROBLEMS:

  • Designed for rails

SYNOPSIS:

Too complex right now. :(

REQUIREMENTS:

  • None

INSTALL:

  • gem install journey
